name: Urban Combat Movement
description: Navigating and engaging in combat within urban environments.

cards.title: Corner Peeking and Pie Slicing
cards.description: Minimizing exposure while peeking around corners in urban combat.
cards.bulletpoints: Use slow, controlled movements, minimize silhouette exposure, employ angle advantage

cards.title: Stairwell and Hallway Tactics
cards.description: Clearing stairwells and hallways while maintaining a tactical advantage.
cards.bulletpoints: Maintain fireteam spacing, control vertical movement, identify ambush points
